BlueberryFairy.notes: While at a base, Prunelia’s prayers bless the crops, increasing their harvest.

PinkRabbit.notes: While at a base, increases work efficiency when working at Weapon Workbench, Weapon Assembly Line, and other related facilities.
PinkRabbit.shortNote: Increased crafting speed at weapons crafting stations

LazyCatfish_Gold.farming: High Quality Pal Oil, Gold Coin

LeafPrincess.notes: While at a base, Lullu fills the farm with good spirits, increasing the growth rate of the crops.

MushroomDragon.notes: While at a base, its mysterious spores slow the rate at which the SAN value of allies at the base decreases.
MushroomDragon.shortNote: Reduced SAN drain of base pals

MushroomDragon_Dark.notes: While at a base, its mysterious spores slow the rate at which the SAN value of allies at the base decreases.
MushroomDragon_Dark.shortNote: Reduced SAN drain of base pals

JellyfishFairy.notes: While Jelliette and Jellroy are in your base, Jelliette’s watering speed is increased.
JellyfishFairy.shortNote: Increased watering speed if with Jellroy

PinkRabbit_Grass.notes: While at a base, increases work efficiency when working at Weapon Workbench, Weapon Assembly Line, and other related facilities.
PinkRabbit_Grass.shortNote: Increased crafting speed at weapons crafting stations

Plesiosaur.notes: While at a base, shortens the time it takes Pals assigned to Breeding Farm to produce eggs. (Effect does not stack.)
Plesiosaur.shortNote: Faster breeding time for pals in breeding farm

JellyfishGhost.notes: While Jelliette and Jellroy are in your base, Jellroy’s watering speed is increased.
JellyfishGhost.shortNote: Increased watering speed if with Jelliette
